title: Murmur
overview: A group of Chennai-based Paranormal YouTubers ventures into a cursed forest in search of "Seven Saptha Kannigal" and the cursed spirit to record the real time paranormal experiences inside the cursed forest and got lost. Then The police force entered into the forest in search of YouTubers but they only found their broken camera's with the Paranormal recordings, and that recorded footage is the storyline of the MURMUR.
